original_text: Then Noah built an altar to make sacrifices to the Lord. He took one from each kind of clean animal and clean bird. He offered them to the Lord as sacrifices which he burned on the altar.
korean_text: 노아가 여호와께 제단을 쌓고 모든 정결한 짐승과 모든 정결한 새 중에서 제물을 취하여 번제로 제단에 드렸더니

sentences.original_text: to make sacrifices to the Lord
He took one from each kind
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 각 종류에서 한 마리씩 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: of clean animal and clean bird
He offered them to the Lord
which he burned on the altar
